environment_variables.READEX_FC: The environment variable from the readex_env/set_env_ptf_hdeem.source file
environment_variables.READEX_INTEL: The environment variable from the readex_env/set_env_ptf_hdeem.source file
environment_variables.FC: The environment variable is set to use scorep with filter and READEX_FC environment variable
environment_variables.FILTER_GCC: The environment variable is set to use scorep filter for GCC compiler
environment_variables.FILTER_ICC: The environment variable is set to use scorep filter for ICC compiler
